settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Add a title or tagline

settings.title_3: We make smarter furniture that is Designed for comfort and convenience.

settings.title: our story
settings.description:
We began as 2 delivery drivers with a dream of owning our own furniture stores.
            Several stores and 25 years later. We had a thought if Elon Musk can put bullet proof glass on his cyber truck, then why the heck can’t we put a lounge chair on a bed?

settings.title_3: We our goal is to be the Swiss Army knife of furniture.

settings.title_2: Functional furniture is not our only goal.
settings.title_3: We also want to help people in need. We already donate 100’s of mattresses each year to the homeless and the less fortunate. And it doesn’t start there Albi Furniture donates a portion of its profits every year and will do so forever!

settings.title: Sleep, work, jam out, get a massage, it's all possible with our smart beds.
Take your bed to the next level

settings.title_3: We began as 2 delivery drivers with a dream of owning our own furniture stores
settings.title_4: Several stores and 25 years later. We had a thought if Elon Musk can put bullet proof glass on his cyber truck, then
settings.title_5: why the heck can’t we put a lounge chair on a bed? After that we began thinking of anything we could add to a bed to make our customers have a more convenient and comfortable life.  In a sense we our goal is to be the Swiss Army knife of furniture.
settings.richtext:
our Mission

Functional furniture is not our only goal.

We also want to help people in need. We already donate 100’s of mattresses each year to the homeless and the less fortunate. And it doesn’t start there Albi Furniture donates a portion of its profits every year and will do so forever!

settings.title:
The Perfect
Bed For You
settings.description: The ultimate luxury bed

settings.title:
The Perfect
Bed For You
settings.description: The ultimate luxury bed

settings.title: our story
settings.description:
We began as 2 delivery drivers with a dream of owning our own furniture stores.
            Several stores and 25 years later. We had a thought if Elon Musk can put bullet proof glass on his cyber truck, then why the heck can’t we put a lounge chair on a bed and other features on a bed?

settings.title: 10 year warranty
settings.textarea: 10  Year Limited Warranty. We will fix or replace any major defects covered in our warranty. Our beds are extremely durable and your satisfaction is our top priority.

settings.title: Free curbside delivery
settings.textarea: Our bed ships right to your driveway or curb. It is easy to assemble and takes us about 30 minutes.

settings.title: Genuine leather
settings.textarea: Our Leather beds are not made of 100% cowhide leather. This means it is long lasting and will not peel like the faux leathers are known to do.

settings.title: Not an Average Bed
settings.textarea: Our bed is so much more than your average bed. 16+ features built in to make your life more convenient and comfortable.

settings.title_2: You could say we are the Swiss Army knife of furniture.
